mapper.select: SELECT U.id, U.email, U.name, U.pw, U.tel, U.addr, U.co_reg_num, U.created_at, merchant_id, M.name AS 'm_name' FROM users U LEFT OUTER JOIN merchants M ON U.merchant_id = M.id WHERE U.EMAIL = #{email}

SELECT O.status, O.created_at, O.order_type, O.id , U.name AS 'user_name', P.p_name AS 'product_name', COUNT(O.id) AS 'count' FROM orders O LEFT OUTER JOIN users U ON U.email = #{email} LEFT OUTER JOIN order_items OT ON OT.order_id = O.id LEFT OUTER JOIN products P ON P.id = OT.product_id WHERE O.user_id = U.id AND O.id = OT.order_id GROUP BY O.id ORDER BY O.id DESC
